results.title: Treatment With Lisinopril Prevents the Early Progression of Glomerular Injury in Obese Dahl Salt-Sensitive Rats Independent of Lowering Arterial Pressure
results.text_hl: Therefore, the current study examined whether treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ to reduce GFR slows the early progression of @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ in SSLepRmutant @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ prior to puberty.

citations.NLM: Brown AK, Nichols A, Coley CA, Ekperikpe US, McPherson KC, Shields CA, Poudel B, Cornelius DC, Williams JM. Treatment With Lisinopril Prevents the Early Progression of Glomerular Injury in Obese Dahl Salt-Sensitive Rats Independent of Lowering Arterial Pressure Front Physiol. 2021;12():765305. PMID: 34975523
citations.BibTeX: @article{34975523, title={Treatment With Lisinopril Prevents the Early Progression of Glomerular Injury in Obese Dahl Salt-Sensitive Rats Independent of Lowering Arterial Pressure}, author={Brown AK and Nichols A and Coley CA and Ekperikpe US and McPherson KC and Shields CA and Poudel B and Cornelius DC and Williams JM}, journal={Front Physiol}, volume={12}, pages={765305}}

results.title: Differing sensitivities to angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition of kidney disease mediated by APOL1 high-risk variants G1 and G2.
results.text_hl: Therefore, in these BAC-transgenic @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ models of APOL1 disease, the anti-@<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuric@@@ and anti-glomerulosclerotic effects of standard dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ were markedly effective in G1/G1 compared with G2/G2 APOL1 @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Karreci ES, Jacas S, Donovan O, Pintye D, Wiley N, Zsengeller ZK, Schlondorff J, Alper SL, Friedman DJ, Pollak MR. Differing sensitivities to angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition of kidney disease mediated by APOL1 high-risk variants G1 and G2. Kidney Int. 2024 Aug 22;():. PMID: 39181397

results.title: Worsening Hypothyroidism in the Setting of New-Onset Nephrotic Syndrome
results.text_hl: Her symptoms gradually improved after receiving a higher dose of @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@, along with diuretics and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ initiation.

citations.NLM: Wang Q, Ravi D, Tang Z, Nand N, Dahhan A. Worsening Hypothyroidism in the Setting of New-Onset Nephrotic Syndrome Cureus. 2023 Aug;15(8):e43345. PMID: 37701005

results.title: Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension.
results.text_hl: Administration of @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@ alone or in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ reduced @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@, @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@glomerular injury@@@, and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@renal fibrosis@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@-SS @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ without altering renal blood flow (RBF) or glomerular filtration rate (GFR).

citations.NLM: Williams JM, Murphy SR, Wu W, Border JJ, Fan F, Roman RJ. Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension. Geroscience. 2022 Dec;44(6):2845-2861. PMID: 35767209

results.title: Membranous-like glomerulopathy with masked IgG-k deposits in a pediatric patient with juvenile idiopathic arthritis.
results.text_hl: She remains on full-dose @CHEMICAL_Mycophenolic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009173 @@@mycophenolate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ with significant improvement in her @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@.

citations.NLM: Chati P, Krissberg J, Henriksen K, Nolan B, Harris M. Membranous-like glomerulopathy with masked IgG-k deposits in a pediatric patient with juvenile idiopathic arthritis. Pediatr Nephrol. 2025 Sep 15;():. PMID: 40954329

results.title: Autotaxin Inhibitor Protects from Chronic Allograft Injury in Rat Kidney Allotransplantation.
results.text_hl: Chronic treatment with ATXi or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ limited progressive @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ and ameliorated @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@tubulointerstitial fibrosis@@@ compared with allograft @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, although the effects were more robust under ATX inhibition.

citations.NLM: Cortinovis M, Aiello S, Mister M, Conde-Knape K, Noris M, Novelli R, Solini S, Rodriguez Ordonez PY, Benigni A, Remuzzi G. Autotaxin Inhibitor Protects from Chronic Allograft Injury in Rat Kidney Allotransplantation. Nephron. 2020;144(1):38-48. PMID: 31550726

results.title: Has APOL1 kidney disease treatment been hiding in plain sight?
results.text_hl: In this issue, Sula Karreci et al. reported that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ reduced @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ and @DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis @DISEASE_MESH:D005921 @@@glomerulosclerosis@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @GENE_APOL1 @GENE_8542 @@@apolipoprotein L1@@@-induced @DISEASE_Glomerulosclerosis_Focal_Segmental @DISEASE_MESH:D005923 @@@focal segmental glomerulosclerosis@@@, in a genotype-specific manner.

citations.NLM: Olabisi OA. Has APOL1 kidney disease treatment been hiding in plain sight? Kidney Int. 2024 Dec;106(6):1015-1017. PMID: 39577983
citations.BibTeX: @article{39577983, title={Has APOL1 kidney disease treatment been hiding in plain sight?}, author={Olabisi OA}, journal={Kidney Int}, volume={106}, number={6}, pages={1015-1017}}

results.title: Double Trouble in the Basement! A Case of PLA2R-Associated Membranous Nephropathy with Atypical Anti-Glomerular Basement Membrane Disease.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ received @CHEMICAL_Rituximab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069283 @@@rituximab@@@ infusion, @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, resulting in remission of @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@.

results.title: Two cases of idiopathic steroid-resistant nephrotic syndrome complicated with thrombotic microangiopathy
results.text_hl: After @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ and blood pressure had gradually decreased.
